page.title: 08Calbourne Mobile Shops
page.content: Calbourne, a small rural Village 5 miles from Newport, has to rely mainly on Mobile Shops and deliveries. The young and old without their own transport are the major users of this facility as buses are few and far between. Once a week deliveries include:{Grocer, Butcher, Baker, Coal {Merchant and Calor Gas cylinder {suppliers.} A mobile butcher and grocer come once a week.{Newspapers} are delivered daily. The{Postman} delivers mail and small parcels, twice a day 5 days a week. Pitts Farm have their own Friesian Dairy herd. They bottle{unpasturised {milk}and deliver this 6 days a week. Other milkmen deliver{pasturised milk {and cream}daily. A{Mobile Library}visits once a fortnight. Where readers can borrow books for a period of 2 weeks.
